title: Spiders pounce on their prey before gorging on the insects and grubs in brutal close-up footage
text:
An avid arachnid collector has filmed her spiders pouncing on and consuming their prey in a series of creepy videos.

Office manager Andrea van Veggel, 28, has collected around 150 species of arachnids that she keeps in her home in Nashville, Tennessee.

The start of the footage shows a huge black spider jump onto a cockroach and drag it away.

In one section of the video a huge black and white spider is seen devouring a bug who helplessly tries to escape (pictured)

Office manager Andrea van Veggel, 28, has collected around 150 species of arachnids that she keeps in her home in Nashville, Tennessee

In a different section of the video another massive black and white spider is seen devouring a bug who helplessly tries to escape.

Andrea’s lifelong passion of collecting spiders began when she was just a little girl back in England.

She said that she would go around the garden and poke at webs with sticks then run away.

After moving to America at the age of five, Andrea caught her first Black Widow and from then on, she always fed and kept spiders that she would find in her house.
description: Office manager Andrea van Veggel, 28, has collected around 150 species of arachnids that she keeps in her home in Nashville, Tennessee.
